dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4532 IH: Defund Extremism Working Group Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Alford introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To limit the use of Federal funds authorized by the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 for the Department of Defense Countering Extremism Work Group.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Defund Extremism Working Group Act.

section.header: Prohibition on use of funds authorized by fiscal year 2024 NDAA for Department of Defense Countering Extremism Work Group
section.text: No funds authorized to be appropriated by the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 may be used to fund the Department of Defense Countering Extremism Work Group.
